name: PlanetIndustries
description:
Backspace is an alternate Esc to avoid closing fullscreen.

Because the tutorial is pretty bad I'm writing a guide here.

The goal is to get money from selling the stuff your colonies produce.
Better resources give more munee. 
To get started you can buy 1 Colonizer, 2 Drill kits, 1 Smelter Kit, and 1 Factory Kit. Then load the colonize_lava script into the colonizer. That will give you a Planet producing iron and copper to experiment on.
The smelter is automatic and smelts 1 Ore per second (1 Ore => 1 Ingot)
The factory will only craft items when a drone tells it to.

The kits need Structural Parts and Electronic Parts, (Drill 7S/3E, Smelter 5S/5E, Factory 3S/7E).

Sorry for making it this complicated.
I really dropped the ball on this one.
